com.github.dandelion.datatables.core.processor
Interface ColumnProcessor

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractColumnProcessor, DefaultValueProcessor, FilterTypeProcessor, SortDirectionProcessor, SortTypeProcessor
public interface ColumnProcessor

Common interface for all processors to be applied on table's columns.

Since:
0.9.0
Author:
Thibault Duchateau

Method Summary
 void processConfiguration(String param, ColumnConfiguration columnConfiguration, TableConfiguration tableConfiguration, Map<Configuration,Object> confToBeApplied)
          Processes the passed configuration and returns the right type needed by the ColumnConfiguration to initialize the configuration.
 

Method Detail

processConfiguration

void processConfiguration(String param,
                          ColumnConfiguration columnConfiguration,
                          TableConfiguration tableConfiguration,
                          Map<Configuration,Object> confToBeApplied)
                          throws ConfigurationProcessingException
Processes the passed configuration and returns the right type needed by the ColumnConfiguration to initialize the configuration.

Parameters:
configuration - The configuration to process. This is always a String because it can come from properties file, JSP tag attributes or Thymeleaf attributes.
the - ColumnConfiguration instance to update with the processing result.
the - TableConfiguration may be used to register some extension depending on column's attributes.
confToBeApplied - The global configuration to be applied on the TableConfiguration may be useful to initialize linked configurations. For example, the AjaxFeature must be registered in the TableConfiguration only if server-side processing in not enabled.
Throws:
ConfigurationProcessingException - if something's goes wrong during the processing.
